name: LN Distant Assessment Method
title: Lymph Nodes Distant Assessment Method
notes:
**Note 1:** Physician statement of Mediastinal and Scalene assessment method can be used to code this data item when no other information is available.

**Note 2:** Assign the highest applicable code (0-2) in the case of multiple assessments.

**Note 3:** Code 0 when there is only imaging or a physical exam.

**Note 4:** The assessment results are recorded in 3875: LN Distant: Mediastinal, Scalene.
